main.prefix: My prefix for this guild is
main.rank_warn: You should have one of this ranks to execute this:

ping.description: Shows delay between server and ZeroBot

help.perms_alert: If one or more items is crossed out, you don't have permission to these categories!
help.perms_warn: You do not have access to category

aliases.not_found: No command for aliases was found!
aliases.perms_warn: You have no permission to view aliases for this command!
aliases.alert: You can use any alias to execute this command!

invite.description: Gives you invite for your server

clear.description: Removes messages that are not older than 2 weeks

unban.cant_fetch: Can't fetch ban! Make sure you gave correct ID!
unban.error: Cant unban! Make sure you gave correct ID!

play.join_warn: You should join to voice channel to use this!
play.perm_warn: I have no permissions to connect or speak in this channel!
play.all_left: All members left the channel! Music will be stopped!
play.cant_yts: Can't get this song from YouTube!
play.cant_scs: Can't get this song from SoundCloud!
play.cant_yms: Can't get this song from Yandex Music!
play.cant_ymp: Can't get this Yandex Music playlist!
play.cant_yma: Can't get this Yandex Music album!
play.unavailable_yms: Sorry this song is unavailable in Yandex Music!
play.yandex_auth: Bot has no valid Yandex Music token! Please, set it in config file!
play.sc_disabled: Sorry, SoundCloud is temporarily disabled, use YouTube instead.
play.not_media: This is not a media file!

pause.nothing: There is nothing playing that I could pause.
pause.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
pause.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!

resume.nothing: There is nothing playing that I could resume.
resume.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!

stop.empty_warn: There are no songs in the queue to stop.
stop.join_warn: You should join to voice channel to use this!
stop.channel_warn: You are in the wrong voice channel!

skip.nothing: There is nothing playing that I could shuffle.
skip.empty_warn: There are no songs in the queue to skip.
skip.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
skip.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!

save.description: Sends music link to your DM
save.dm_disabled: You have disabled direct messages, open it to use this command!
save.sent: I have sent you a DM with the current song!

volume.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
volume.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!
volume.number_warn: You must give number between 1 and 100!
volume.small_warn: Given volume is too small (min volume is 1)
volume.big_warn: Given volume is too big (max volume is 100)

loop.nothing: There is nothing playing that I could loop.
loop.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
loop.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!
loop.empty_warn: There are no songs in the queue to loop.
loop.queue_warn: The queue loop is already enabled.
loop.song_warn: The current song loop is already enabled.
loop.queue: The queue loop has been enabled.
loop.song: The current song loop has been enabled.

shuffle.nothing: There is nothing playing that I could shuffle.
shuffle.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
shuffle.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!
shuffle.empty_warn: There are no songs in the queue to shuffle.

leave.not_in: I am not in a voice channel!
leave.join_warn: You need to be in a voice channel to use that command!
leave.channel_warn: You need to be in the same voice channel as the bot to use that command!

time.description: Sending current date and time in UTC format

coub.description: Shows random coub from given community
coub.order_warn: Order is not correct, using default order.
help: (community) for random video from specified community.

rip.description: Make tombstone with user (or with you)
